channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Float menu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Float menu

item.title: CVE-2024-2405|2024-05-02T06:00:02.127Z -- Unknown -- Float menu
item.description: The Float menu WordPress plugin before 6.0.1 does not have CSRF check in its bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin delete arbitrary menu via a CSRF attack.
